CustomField.description: BF-27: Close Date Text field to be used in Date Name
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Close_Date__c )), CASE(MONTH(Close_Date__c), 1, 'January', 2, 'February', 3, 'March', 4, 'April', 5, 'May', 6, 'June', 7, 'July', 8, 'August', 9, 'September', 10, 'October', 11, 'November', 12, 'December', '') & ' ' & TEXT(DAY(Close_Date__c)) & ' ' & TEXT(YEAR(Close_Date__c)), NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Close Date Text field to be used in Date Name
CustomField.label: Close Date Text
